Fales Library and Special Collections
C: A Journal of Poetry Archive
C: A Journal of Poetry
MSS.008
0.5 Linear Feet in one manuscript box.
ca. 1955-1966 (Bulk 1964-1966) 1964-1966 The C: A Journal of Poetry Archive is a collection of correspondence and manuscripts submitted to the editor, Ted Berrigan. The collection also includes issues of C: A Journal of Poetry.
Access Restrictions
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known);
The C: A Journal of PoetryArchive; MSS 8; [Box number]; [Folder number]; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
Scope and Content Note
The C: A Journal of Poetry Archive contains correspondence and manuscripts submitted to the editor, Ted Berrigan. Collection highlights include correspondence and manuscripts written by John Ashbery, Marianne Moore, and James Schuyler. The collection also includes issues of the magazine.
Arrangement
The C: A Journal of PoetryArchive is arranged alphabetically. Published materials in the collection such as issues of the magazine and comics are arranged chronologically.
Missing Title
Series I: Correspondence, Manuscripts, Covers, and Publications
Series II: Comics
Separated Material
There is no information about materials that are associated by provenance to the described materials that have been physically separated or removed.
Use Restrictions
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

Scope and Contents note
Consists of one folder containing 2 issues of a comic book put out by many of the same people who contributed to C: A Journal of Poetry.C: Comics, Nos. 1 and 2undated112
